data.name: Familia
data.detailed_description:
Just Updated

Familia 1.3 features new optional endgame content showcasing additional enemies, scalable randomized dungeons, and randomized loot drops. Clash with the ancient evil known as Mother. Explore the vast reaches, like the Immortal warriors of the past.


About the Game



Tension has been building for millennia and war is on the horizon. At the center of the war, a small family tries their best to find each other. To be there for each other.

Familia tells the stories from relatable characters in an unrelatable world. Mothers, fathers, sisters, brothers, and others all seeking to take back what's rightfully theirs from the tyrannical Empire.



The Father


The mysterious man who awoke in the desert not knowing who he is. Will he find his way home?

Koko, The Daughter


Constantly assumed by others to be harmless, Koko exudes limitless potential. Despite being an intellectual genius, she does lack physical strength when compared to the rest of her family. She spends most of her time with her Grandma, whom she adores.

Poki, The Son


Poki is a martial arts Prodigy, who longs for acknowledgment. When not looking after Koko, he trains constantly. Despite being a teenager, he feels as if he should be deployed on missions with his famed father.

Keeria, The Mother


Keeria is considered by many to be one of the world’s greatest assassins, which is a title, that she does not prefer. She would prefer to live out in isolation with her family for the rest of her life. She has sworn off fighting but perhaps she may not be able to uphold her vow.



  • Expansive story
  • Original music by acclaimed musicians
  • Original pixel art and digital paintings
  • An innovative experience, calling on classic RPG elements
  • 11 playable characters
  • Game+ mode for multiple replays and end-game content
  • The majority of the game development was broadcasted live on Twitch (https://www.twitch.tv/mauigamestudio).
  • The game uses both stock art and original art

data.short_description: Familia follows four protagonists through a journey to retake their homeland. The game’s style is highly influenced by 90s style Japanese role-playing games like Final Fantasy 1-6.
data.reviews:
“This game has been an amazing journey to witness.”
10 – BigPapaGoose

“Excellent RPG with heavy influences from old school JRPGs such as Breath of Fire, Final Fantasy, Suikoden and more. It pays homage to the games that inspired it but never gets too heavy handed with the tropes. Pixel art is excellent and the world is beautiful and alive. The combat system is standard RPG fare and is smooth and accessible to the player.”
10 – Euphoric Lemon

“I guess the art is nice...”
7 – My mom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 Ghz or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game's performance is greatly dependent on hard drive speed. If you have a slow hard drive, you will see some significant slowdown. While Familia supports mouse play, controller is recommended by the game developer. Keyboard is the second best option.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOSX
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: MacOS system requirement testing is currently underway. It's worth noting that the macOS version is updated less frequently as Mac players account for less than 4% of the player base.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
